Text: WARNING:If you're looking for football action DON'T download this.Like all TvTeams' Champions League uploads this is just studio chat from Al Jazeera,as soon as it goes to the ground for the kick off it cuts straight to the final whistle and then back to the studio,showing everything EXCEPT any actual football.Why do you do this?Don't waste your time,download albiondeans' Champions League instead,you actually see some football.This is retarded.
